description:
Keep your hands free and your stride smooth with this ergonomic, bounce-free running belt. The Trail Mix Plus 3.0 carries two 300ml flasks and the expandable zippered storage pocket has space for a phone, gels and small accessories like keys or cards. Handy shock cord loops let you stash items like gloves, hats or a windbreaker if conditions change.

  • Ergonomic belt stretches in multiple directions for a secure, bounce-free fit
  • Secure holsters allow one-handed access to flasks
  • Includes two 300 mL flasks with Push-Pull Blast Valve™ caps
  • Zip pocket has a front stash pouch for gels and fits most large-format phones
  • Dual shock cords with quick-pull tensioners for extra capacity
  • Elastic keepers retain excess strap length
  • Reflective trim
  • Fits waist circumferences of 66-112cm (25-44in.)
name: Nathan Trail Mix Plus 3.0 - Unisex
